name: visreg-test
description: A visual regression testing solution that offers an easy setup with simple yet powerful customisation options, wrapped up in a convenient CLI runner to make assessing and accepting/rejecting diffs a breeze.

scripts.build: npm run clear && tsc && cp -r src/scaffold dist/ && cp -r src/container-config dist/ && cp src/start-visreg-test.sh dist/
scripts.build-dev-container: npm run build && chmod +x sandbox-project/node_modules/visreg-test/dist/visreg.js && chmod +x sandbox-project/node_modules/visreg-test/dist/start-visreg-test.sh && cd sandbox-project && node_modules/visreg-test/dist/start-visreg-test.sh --build-container --env=dev
scripts.patch: npm run prep && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm run prep && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.major: npm run prep && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.prep: npm run doc && npm install && npm run build

author: Christofer Haglund <cchaglund@users.noreply.github.com>
